description:
Dazai and Atsushi swap minds when they bonk heads. Datsushi doesn’t mind, but Azai wants him to stay out of trouble. Atsushi tries to get back at Dazai for all the times he’d surprised him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Swap Theater / My Treasure / Nakajima Atsushi`s Plan
Torikaekko Gekijou / Watashi no Takaramono / Nakajima Atsushi, Kakusaku Suru
とりかえっこ劇場 / 私の宝物 / 中島敦, 画策する
